bibl.note: P. Oxy. LVIII, 3915-3962. - I. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (3915-3932). - II. Documents of the Late Byzantine Period (3933-3962).
bibl.seg: REA J.R., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LVIII (Nos 3915-3962). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 78.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1991, 8°, xxvii-155 pp. et VIII pll.
P. Oxy. LVIII, 3915-3962. - I. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (3915-3932). - II. Documents of the Late Byzantine Period (3933-3962).

C.R. par Giuliana Foti Talamanca, Iura 42 (1991 [1994]) pp. 220-225. - James G. Keenan, BASP 29 (1992) pp. 211-217. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 69 (1994) No. 138, pp. 366-370. - Bernhard Palme, Tyche 9 (1994) pp. 245-246. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 43 (1993) pp. 222-223. - Guy Wagner, CR N.S., 43 (1993) pp. 144-147.
